name: zkrandom-engine
description: Multi-chain ZK proof-based randomness oracle using Horizen zkVerify
author: OxShikhar

scripts.test: bun run test:unit && bun run test:integration
scripts.test:unit: bun run --cwd api test && bun run --cwd nextjs test
scripts.lint: bun run --cwd api lint && bun run --cwd nextjs lint
scripts.format: bun run --cwd api format && bun run --cwd nextjs format
scripts.setup: bun run setup:env && bun run setup:install && bun run setup:compile
scripts.setup:install: bun install && bun install --cwd api && bun install --cwd nextjs && bun install --cwd circuits
scripts.deploy:testnet: cd contract && bun run deploy --network baseSepolia
scripts.deploy:mainnet: cd contract && bun run deploy --network base
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf api/node_modules && rm -rf nextjs/node_modules && rm -rf circuits/node_modules
scripts.build:all: bun run circuits:compile && bun run build
scripts.install:all: bun install && bun install --cwd api && bun install --cwd nextjs && bun install --cwd circuits
